2633.name: AUTHENTICATION_LOCKED
2633.message:
Due to repeated incorrect password
entries, you are temporarily unable
to sign in to Nintendo Network

Please try again later.
2633.short_description: You entered an incorrect password multiple times and have now been temporarily locked out.
2633.long_description: You entered an incorrect password multiple times and have now been temporarily locked out.
2633.short_solution: Wait for the timeout to end and enter the correct password.
2633.long_solution: Wait for the timeout to end and enter the correct password.
